item.title: I Believe ... Help My Unbelief
item.description: Typed sermon from 1984. Likely preached at St. Stephen Lutheran Church in Wausau, WI. Gospel verses are listed as Mark 9: 14-27, which doesn’t seem to have a direct correlation in the current Revised Common Lectionary.
